util

Class StaticUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.StaticUtils

  • public class StaticUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class containing static helper functions.
    Author:
    Adam Lechovsky

      static java.util.List<org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Point> getBiggestSquare(java.util.List<java.util.List<org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Point>> squares)
      Takes a List of squares where each square is a List of four Points (doesn't strictly have to be a square) and returns the one with the largest area.

      Takes the output of getLines() and groups the lines into vertical and horizontal lines which are at least threshold apart from each other.

      Takes a List of Points and groups the Points so that the distance between any two groups is at least threshold.

    • Method Detail

      • getLines

        public static java.util.List<Pair<org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Point,org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Point>> getLines(org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Mat img,
                                                                                                                           int dilateIterations)
        Calls OpenCV HoughLinesP() and all necessary transformations on the source image.
        Parameters:
        img - The image to call HoughLinesP() on
        dilateIterations - how many iterations to run the dilate OpenCV function
        Returns:
        The result of HoughLinesP() as ArrayList of lines, where one line is a Pair of Points

      • groupLines

        public static void groupLines(java.util.List<Pair<org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Point,org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Point>> input,
                              java.util.List<Pair<org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Point,org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Point>> horizontal,
                              java.util.List<Pair<org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Point,org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Point>> vertical,
                              int threshold)
        Takes the output of getLines() and groups the lines into vertical and horizontal lines which are at least threshold apart from each other.
        Parameters:
        input - The List of lines to group
        horizontal - The result horizontal lines will be put into this List - should already be initialized
        vertical - The result vertical lines will be put into this List - should already be initialized
        threshold - A number denoting how far should the groups of lines be from each other in pixels

      • groupPoints

        public static java.util.List<org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Point> groupPoints(java.util.List<org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Point> points,
                                                                                 double threshold)
        Takes a List of Points and groups the Points so that the distance between any two groups is at least threshold. Every group then gets transformed into a single Point by averaging the Points in the group.
        Parameters:
        points - The List of Points to be grouped
        threshold - The distance between groups in pixels
        Returns:
        The grouped List of Points

      • display

        public static void display(org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Mat image,
                           java.lang.String caption)
        Opens a single window with set image and caption.
        Parameters:
        image - The image to show in the window
        caption - The caption of the window

      • getPaperTransformation

        public static org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Mat getPaperTransformation(org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Mat image)
        Takes an image, finds a paper in it and returns a transformation that would scale the paper over the whole image.
        Parameters:
        image - The image to calculate the transformation from
        Returns:
        The transformation required to scale the paper in the image over the whole image

      • lineIntersection

        public static org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Point lineIntersection(Pair<org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Point,org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Point> line1,
                                                                      Pair<org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Point,org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Point> line2)
                                                               throws NoIntersectionException
        Takes two lines written as Pairs of Points and returns the Point of their intersection.
        Parameters:
        line1 - The first line
        line2 - The second line
        Returns:
        The Point of intersection of the two lines
        Throws:
        NoIntersectionException - Thrown when the two lines do not intersect

      • dist

        public static double dist(org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Point p1,
                          org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Point p2)
        Calculates the distance between two Points.
        Parameters:
        p1 - The first Point
        p2 - The second Point
        Returns:
        The distance between the two Points

      • getBiggestSquare

        public static java.util.List<org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Point> getBiggestSquare(java.util.List<java.util.List<org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Point>> squares)
                                                                               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Takes a List of squares where each square is a List of four Points (doesn't strictly have to be a square) and returns the one with the largest area.
        Parameters:
        squares - The list of squares
        Returns:
        The largest square by area.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the list of squares is empty.

      • findSquares

        public static void findSquares(org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Mat image,
                               java.util.List<java.util.List<org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Point>> squares)
        Takes an image and returns a List of squares (4 sided polygons) as returned by OpenCV approxPolyDP().
        Parameters:
        image - The image to find squares in
        squares - The output List with the squares. Must already be initialized

      • angle

        public static double angle(org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Point pt1,
                           org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Point pt2,
                           org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Point pt0)
        Calculates the angle between three Points, where pt0 is the center Point.
        Parameters:
        pt1 - The first side Point
        pt2 - The second side Point
        pt0 - The center Point
        Returns:
        The cosine of the angle between the three Points

      • sortSquareClockWise

        public static java.util.List<org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Point> sortSquareClockWise(java.util.List<org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Point> square)
        Takes a square as a List of four Points and sorts its vertices in a clockwise fashion.
        Parameters:
        square - The square to be sorted
        Returns:
        The sorted square
